arts.ttl: Limited-Edition Kappa x KOCHÉ AS Monaco 2025 Kit Released
arts.sum: Kappa has teamed up with fashion brand KOCHÉ to launch a special AS Monaco shirt paying homage to the Principality and will be released in limited edition.
